Text.Page:
We need to collect as much noctenium energy as possible. Some of the research we're getting back suggests there's some important materials we can extract from it.

If we get enough, we can collect it and repurpose it, probably into defenses. Bring me as much Arunic noctenium energy from the noctenium fluxes as you can.
Fantastic. Thank you. I'll get these to our researchers.
